name: Larry, The Dog Lawyer (revisited)
description:
This is a short fiction that has gone through a few different iterations. It has been a script, a Twine game, and now it is a Ren'Py game. 

This game has a fun criticism of how crime is perceived in the US, but the focus of this game (for me) is a character study of a violent criminal. Although there are no choices in this version of the story, it recreates a linear version of the most interesting story that the original Twine game had. 

I hope you enjoy this little game!
